ticker: Join us over the festive period for live DJs mixing every Saturday night!
Best wishes from all our station staff, mods and DJs to all our subwoofers!
Come in from the cold and spread some holiday cheer to see us to the weekend!
Please, do not, the christmas tree. It's not insured.
Be sure to join the Fallback VRChat group at: https://vrc.group/FLLBCK.3832

performers.name: Funnel Vision
ticker: Follow Funnel Vision on Bluesky @funnelvisionvrc.bsky.social and mixcloud.com/FunnelVissionVRC

ticker: This event terminates here. Best wishes to you all over the festive season!
